title: Rupert and the Runaway Dragon
brief_description: Britain’s favourite bear returns with Ping-Pong, Tiger-Lily and all his chums in several delightful; stories, beautifully illustrated and charmingly told. So enter Rupert’s enchanted world where dragons run away, robins turn yellow, eggs hatch firebirds and tree house goblins. Even Father Christmas gets called on for help. Excitement and magic with a very special bear. Rated: G
